title: Saudações e Apresentações
script: Hello! Welcome to WIMEX-UP. Today we learn greetings. Say: Hi, how are you? I'm fine, thanks. Nice to meet you.

title: Rotinas Diárias
script: Good morning! Let's talk about daily routines. I wake up at 7. I have breakfast at 8.

title: Família e Amigos
script: Hi! Today: family and friends. This is my mother. This is my brother.

title: Comida e Compras
script: Hello! Let's go shopping. I want bread and milk. How much is the apple?

title: Números e Horários
script: Hi! Numbers and time. It's 3:30. The train leaves at 5:15.

title: Cores e Objetos
script: Hello! Colors and objects. The sky is blue. My car is red.

title: Profissões e Hobbies
script: Hi! Jobs and hobbies. I'm a teacher. She is a doctor.

title: Direções Simples
script: Hello! Directions. Turn left. Go straight.

title: Clima e Estações
script: Hi! Weather. It's sunny today. Yesterday it rained.

title: Revisão Básica
script: Great job! Review: Hi, how are you? I wake up at 7.

title: Viagens e Aeroportos
script: Welcome to the airport! I'd like to check in. Here's my passport.

title: Hotéis e Check-in
script: Good evening! I have a reservation. Name: Silva.

title: Restaurantes e Pedidos
script: Table for two, please. Can I see the menu?

title: Transporte Público
script: Excuse me, does this bus go to downtown?

title: Compras em Lojas
script: Hi! Do you have this in medium?

title: Saúde e Emergências
script: Hello, I need a doctor. I have a headache.

title: Trabalho Diário
script: Good morning team! Meeting at 9.

title: Lazer e Eventos
script: What are you doing this weekend?

title: Telefone e E-mails
script: Hello, this is John speaking.

title: Revisão Média
script: Excellent! Review: Check-in at hotel.

title: Opiniões e Debates
script: In my opinion, remote work is better.

title: Negócios e Reuniões
script: Let's discuss the proposal.

title: Cultura e Tradições
script: In Brazil, we have Carnival.

title: Problemas e Soluções
script: The project is delayed.

title: Expressões Idiomáticas
script: It's raining cats and dogs.

title: Notícias e Atualidades
script: Breaking news: new tech law approved.

title: Relacionamentos Profissionais
script: Great networking at the conference.

title: Viagens Avançadas
script: Business class upgrade available.

title: Entretenimento e Mídia
script: Have you seen the new Marvel movie?

title: Revisão Avançada
script: Congratulations! You mastered English.
